recipes.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
steps: In a large pot, cook the ground beef over medium heat until browned. Drain excess fat.
Add the chopped onion and minced garlic to the pot. Cook until the onion is translucent.
Stir in the crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, dried basil, dried oregano, salt, and black pepper. Simmer for 30 minutes, stirring occasionally.
Meanwhile, cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Drain the spaghetti.
Serve the spaghetti topped with the Bolognese sauce and sprinkle with grated Parmesan cheese.

recipes.title: Chocolate Chip Cookies
steps: Preheat oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C).
In a large bowl, cream together the butter, white sugar, and brown sugar until smooth.
Beat in the eggs one at a time, then stir in the vanilla.
Combine the flour, baking soda, and salt; gradually stir into the creamed mixture.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased baking sheets.
Bake for 8 to 10 minutes in the preheated oven, or until golden brown.
